title: "Cochlear implants aid speech recognition in most adults"
excerpt: "Most adult patients have statistically significant postoperative improvements in speech recognition after receiving cochlear implants, according to a study published online Jan. 7 in JAMA Otolaryngology-Head & Neck Surgery."
